edu.mines.jtk.sgl

Interface Selectable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AxisAlignedQuad, QuadGroup, TriangleGroup

    public interface Selectable
    An interface implemented by nodes that can be selected. This interface serves as a marker interface, because its methods are implemented by the abstract base class Node for all nodes, whether selectable or not. The behavior of those implementations depends on whether or not the class that extends Node also implements this marker interface.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isSelected()
      Determines whether this node is currently selected.
      void setSelected(boolean selected)
      Sets the selected state for this node.

    • Method Detail

      • isSelected

        boolean isSelected()
        Determines whether this node is currently selected.
        Returns:
        true, if selected; false, otherwise.

      • setSelected

        void setSelected(boolean selected)
        Sets the selected state for this node.
        Parameters:
        selected - true, for selected; false, otherwise.
